title: pls be aware NOT all the Asian people are Chinese!!!!

replies.msg:
Actually there are also countries in Asia like Taiwan, Japan, Korea, Hong Kong, where are civilised, open minded, connected to the value of western countries , believing in freedom and democracy.

When you see an east Asian on the street, before you start thinking that they must be from China, rich, brainwashed, afraid of talking about politics, don’t have Facebook or WhatsApp, and so on.
No, please actually look at their behaviour and be fair to the people from the rest of the countries of Asia.

All of us just hate fucking CCP China like you do!!
Mongolia: Am I a joke to you?

quote.msg: Mongolia: Am I a joke to you?
Mongolia: Am I a joke to you?

replies.msg: I was talking about Mongolia with the red and blue flag the whole time. There's no such thing as north Mongolia.
